Uses of Interface
org.nzdis.micro.Agent

  • Packages that use Agent 
    Package Description
    org.nzdis.micro  
    org.nzdis.micro.exceptions  
    org.nzdis.micro.messaging.network.netty  

    • Uses of Agent in org.nzdis.micro

      Classes in org.nzdis.micro that implement Agent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractAgent
      The Class AbstractAgent is the core implementation to the agent interface provided with the OPAL micro-agent framework.
      class  AnonymousAgent
      The AnonymousAgent is the simplest agent implementation and passes received messages directly to its roles handleMessage() method (via AbstractAgent).
      class  SystemOwner
      Represents a system owner.
      Methods in org.nzdis.micro that return Agent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Agent SystemAgentLoader.findAgent(java.lang.String agentName)
      Finds a registered agent by agent name.
      Agent AgentLoader.findAgent(java.lang.String agentName)
      Finds an agent by its name across the whole hierarchy.
      Agent Group.findAgentByName(java.lang.String name)
      Finds agent by name in this group (not across other groups).
      static Agent[] SystemAgentLoader.findAgentsByIntent(java.lang.Class intentType)
      Finds all existing Agents for a given intent type along the entire agent hierarchy.
      Agent[] AgentLoader.findAgentsByIntent(java.lang.Class<Intent> intentType, boolean includeGroupOwnerInSearch)
      Finds all existing Agents for a given intent type recursively throughout all sub-groups.
      Agent[] Group.findAgentsByIntent(java.lang.Class anIntentType, boolean includeGroupOwnerInSearch)
      Lookup method for locating agents.
      Agent[] Group.findAgentsByIntentNonRecursive(java.lang.Class anIntentType, boolean includeGroupOwnerInSearch)
      Lookup method for locating agents.
      static Agent[] SystemAgentLoader.findAgentsByRole(java.lang.Class roleType)
      Finds all working agents for a given role type along the entire agent hierarchy.
      Agent[] AgentLoader.findAgentsByRoles(java.lang.Class aRoleType, boolean includeGroupOwnerInSearch)
      Finds all working agents for a given role type recursively throughout all sub-groups.
      Agent[] Group.findAgentsByRoleType(java.lang.Class roleType, boolean includeGroupOwnerInSearch)
      Lookup method for locating agents.
      Agent[] Group.findAgentsByRoleTypeNonRecursive(java.lang.Class roleType, boolean includeGroupOwnerInSearch)
      Lookup method for locating roles.
      Agent Role.getAgent()
      Returns the actor who currently plays this particular role.
      Agent AbstractRole.getAgent()
      Returns the actual Agent handle for this role.
      static Agent[] SystemAgentLoader.getAgents()
      Returns all registered agents on the top level.
      Agent[] Group.getAgents()
      Returns all the agents registered within this group.
      Agent[] AgentLoader.getAgents()
      Returns all agents registered in the group of this AgentLoader's owner.
      static Agent[] SystemAgentLoader.getAgentsRecursive()
      Returns all agents registered with the entire agent hierarchy.
      Agent[] Group.getAgentsRecursive()
      Returns all sub-agents in a recursive manner down to the leaves of the hierarchy.
      Agent[] AgentLoader.getAgentsRecursive()
      Returns all agents of this group and all sub-agents of those.
      Agent Agent.getOwner()
      Returns this agent's owner.
      Agent AbstractAgent.getOwner()
      returns the Owner of the agent
      static Agent SystemAgentLoader.newAgent(Agent anAgent)
      Registers an instantiated agent with the platform, in the SystemOwner group.
      Agent AgentLoader.newAgent(Agent anAgent)
      Registers an existing agent instance with the platform.
      static Agent SystemAgentLoader.newAgent(java.lang.Class agentclass)
      Instantiate an Agent for a given Agent class.
      Agent AgentLoader.newAgent(java.lang.Class anAgentClass)
      Instantiate an Agent for a given Agent class.

      Registers role for agents after their initialization.
      void Group.reregister(Agent anAgent)
